body_html:
Could you try to just build & test the relevant test targets?

For instance:

bazel test //tensorflow/python:saver_test  # Or other Python/C++ test targets.

I am not sure if this works in OSS world or not. If not, when building build_pip_package feel free to drop the -c opt to improve build times.
body_text:
Could you try to just build & test the relevant test targets?
For instance:
bazel test //tensorflow/python:saver_test  # Or other Python/C++ test targets.

I am not sure if this works in OSS world or not.  If not, when building build_pip_package feel free to drop the -c opt to improve build times.
body:
Could you try to just build & test the relevant test targets?

For instance:

```
bazel test //tensorflow/python:saver_test  # Or other Python/C++ test targets.
```

I am not sure if this works in OSS world or not.  If not, when building `build_pip_package` feel free to drop the `-c opt` to improve build times.
